alert.note: Alert for Tinian (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 26 at 7:04PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...URBAN AND SMALL STREAM FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CHST... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHEN...Until 9 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 901 AM UTC, satellite estimates indicate heavy rain moving toward Tinian. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Jose (Tinian Municipality), Marpo Heights, Carolinas Heights, Eastern Tinian (Marpo Valley), Carolinas, Western Tinian and Northern Tinian. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
